errors.error_description: The order of dependency installation is incorrect. The `pip install` command is executed before installing the required system-level development packages (`libxml2-dev`, `libxslt1-dev`), which can cause the installation of Python packages that depend on them to fail.
correction_candidates: The correct order is to first run `pip install -r requirements.txt`, then run `apt-get install python-dev libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev zlib1g-dev`.
Run both commands together: `apt-get install ... && pip install ...`.
The correct order is to first run `apt-get install python-dev libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev zlib1g-dev`, then run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
Install Python packages individually, then run the `apt-get` command.
errors.golden_answer: The correct order is to first run `apt-get install python-dev libxml2-dev libxslt1-dev zlib1g-dev`, then run `pip install -r requirements.txt`.

errors.error_description: The command to copy the sample configuration file places it in the wrong directory. It copies `0firstrun.py.sample` to `stopstalk/0firstrun.py` instead of `stopstalk/models/0firstrun.py`, and the application will not find it.
